name: Road To Adventure! DEMO
description:
The first level of my upcoming project: ROAD TO ADVENTURE!

A 2d Pixel Platformer evoking the best of the SNES era with the best of modern Pixel Art.

This is a little demo you can enjoy, with only the first of 14 different Levels. Expect great level design, fun but hard levels, the ability to grab boxes and jump high and low!

Art made by: grafxkid.artstation.com

Sound and Music by: opengameart.org/users/codemanu

Programming and Level Design: LateNighCoffe.

- If you like this demo, and if you can, a donation will help.
